AwtKeyEventTester - Class in cogimag.java.keyboard.development
Tests the AwtKeyMap_EN_US by looking up in the HashMap a character that the user types into the input box and repeating this character to the output box through java.awt.event.KeyEvent.

Base class for language-specific subclasses of the keyboard mapping.

AwtRoboSteno - Class in cogimag.java.keyboard
Adaptation of Robot for use with the AwtKeyMap in this package
AwtRoboSteno(AwtKeyMap) - Constructor for class cogimag.java.keyboard.AwtRoboSteno
The robot must be linked to a AwtKeyMap in order to look up the correct AwtCharConstruction object.
AwtRobotTester - Class in cogimag.java.keyboard.development
Tests the AwtKeyMap_EN_US by looking up in the HashMap a character that the user types into the input box and repeating this character to the output box through java.awt.Robot.
AwtStringTester - Class in cogimag.java.keyboard.development
Repeats the user's input through either AwtKeyEventSteno or AwtRoboSteno.
